summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4962 for the improvement of the alley east of block 5, Belvoir Addition, and west of block 9, Belvoir Addition, and west of block 7, Laurelhurst Addition, being the alley from East 37th Street to East 41st Street, between 41st Avenue Northeast and 42nd Avenue Northeast.
